title: Partial Take Profit Waterfall
prompt: Create a trading chart showing partial take profit strategy. Display candlesticks with a long position from entry point. Mark horizontal levels: 'Entry' (blue line), 'SL' (red line below), 'TP1' (first green line, labeled '1:1 RR - Close 40%'), 'TP2' (second green line, labeled '1:2 RR - Close 30%'), 'TP3' (third green line, labeled '1:3 RR - Close 30%'). Show position size boxes decreasing at each TP: 1.0 lot → 0.6 lot → 0.3 lot → 0 lot. Add 'Move SL to BE' arrow at TP1. Include waterfall diagram on the side showing profit lock progression. Annotations showing pips and dollar amounts at each level. Dark background (#0F172A). Professional trade management visualization.
negative_prompt: cluttered levels, overlapping labels, hard to follow progression, inconsistent line styles
